chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
y: Rbar
x: Rbar
z: posreal

Goal:
Rbar_le x y <-> Rbar_le (Rbar_div_pos x z) (Rbar_div_pos y z)

Premises:
Rbar_div_pos = fun (x : Rbar) (y : posreal) => match x with | Finite x0 => Finite (x0 / y) | _ => x end : Rbar -> posreal -> Rbar
Rbar_le = fun x y : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => match y with | Finite y0 => x0 <= y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match y with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
Rbar_div_pos_lt : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), Rbar_lt x y < -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_div_pos x z) (Rbar_div_pos y z)
Rbar_mult_pos_le : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), Rbar_le x y < -> Rbar_le (Rbar_mult_pos x z) (Rbar_mult_pos y z)
Rbar_opp_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le (Rbar_opp x) (Rbar_opp y) < -> Rbar_le y x
Rbar_le_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_le x z
Rbar_le_antisym : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_le y x -> x = y
Rbar_mult_pos_lt : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), Rbar_lt x y < -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_mult_pos x z) (Rbar_mult_pos y z)
Rbar_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le x y
Rbar_le_not_lt : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le y x -> ~ Rbar_lt x y
Rbar_lt_not_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt y x -> ~ Rbar_le x y
Rbar_not_le_lt : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y x
Rbar_not_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y x
Rbar_le_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_lt_le_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_le_lt_or_eq_dec : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> {Rbar_lt x y} + {x = y}
Rbar_le_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_le x y} + {~ Rbar_le x y}
Rbar_finite_eq : forall x y : R, x = y < -> x = y
Rbar_mult_pos_eq : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), x = y < -> Rbar_mult_pos x z = Rbar_mult_pos y z
Rbar_div_pos_eq : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), x = y < -> Rbar_div_pos x z = Rbar_div_pos y z
Rbar_le_refl : forall x : Rbar, Rbar_le x x
Rmin_r : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= y
Rln = fun y : posreal => let (a, _) := ln_exists y (cond_pos y) in a : posreal -> R
Rmin_l : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= x
Rbar_plus_le_compat : forall a b c d : Rbar, Rbar_le a b -> Rbar_le c d -> Rbar_le (Rbar_plus a c) (Rbar_plus b d)
Rbar_le_lt_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_le x y} + {Rbar_lt y x}
Rbar_lt_le_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_lt x y} + {Rbar_le y x}
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
f_equal_R : forall (B : Type) (f : R -> B) (x y : R), x = y -> f x = f y
Rabs_mult : forall x y : R, Rabs (x * y) = Rabs x * Rabs y
Rbar_total_order : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_lt x y} + {x = y} + {Rbar_lt y x}
SubEquiN = fix SubEquiN (N : nat) (x y : R) (del : posreal) {struct N} : Rlist := match N with | 0%nat => cons y nil | S p => cons x (SubEquiN p (x + del) y del) end : nat -> R -> R -> posreal -> Rlist Argument scopes are [nat_scope R_scope R_scope _]
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
Rbar_plus = fun x y : Rbar => match Rbar_plus' x y with | Some z => z | None => Finite 0 end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Rbar
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Rbar_lt = fun x y : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => match y with | Finite y0 => x0 < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => False | m_infty => match y with | m_infty => False | _ => True end end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
seq.last_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : list T) (z : T), seq.last x (seq.rcons s z) = z
ln_exists : forall y : R, 0 < y -> {z : R | y = exp z}
uniform_continuity = fun (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y : R, X x -> X y -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
RList_P3 : forall (l : Rlist) (x : R), In x l < -> (exists i : nat, x = pos_Rl l i /\ (i < Rlength l)%nat)
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]

```coq
unfold Rbar_le. unfold Rbar_div_pos. destruct x, y; simpl; split; intros H; auto; try contradiction.
- apply Rbar_div_pos_lt. auto.
- apply Rbar_div_pos_lt. auto.
Qed.
```
